required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Effect of Itraconazole on the Pharmacokinetics of Pyrotinib in Healthy Subjects
clinical_study.official_title: A Single-centre, Open, Single-dose, Self-control Study to Investigate the Effect of Itraconazole on the Pharmacokinetics of Pyrotinib in Healthy Subjects

brief_summary.textblock: The study will assess the effect of multiple oral doses of itraconazole on the single dose pharmacokinetic parameters of pyrotinib in healthy Chinese subjects. The safety of pyrotinib alone and when co-administered with itraconazole will also be assessed.

study_design_info.intervention_model_description: Pyrotinib alone and then combined with itraconazole

primary_outcome.description: Area under the plasma concentration versus time curve of SHR6390

secondary_outcome.description: Time of maximum concentration of pyrotinib

secondary_outcome.time_frame: From the first drug administration to 7 days after the last drug administration
secondary_outcome.description: Adverse events and serious adverse events

arm_group.description: Sequential treatments of pyrotinib alone followed by pyrotinib + itraconazole, with a washout period in between.

intervention.description: single oral dose of SHR6390 or co-administered with itraconazole

facility.name: The Second Hospital of Anhui Medical University
